overview: Cameras explore the Seven Seas Splendor as it sets sail on its maiden Yuletide voyage this Christmas. Temperatures are soaring as the six-star floating hotel sets sail around the Caribbean, and the pressure is higher than ever on board. Will staff be able to maintain impeccably high standards? And what does it take to host spectacular festivities at sea, when no expense has been spared?
title: World's Most Expensive Christmas Cruise
